title: Pondering Obama
author: VD
content_html:
The OC emails with a thought-provoking question:

The question was posed: what will El Presidente Big Daddy Obama’s proposed Civilian National Security Force be able to do that the existing National Guard cannot already do?

The answer is, being a “civilian” agency, anything the National Guard and other established military forces are forbidden to do within the borders of our country by the 1876 Posse Comitatus Act.

Well, isn’t THAT a happy little thought now! I shall have to ponder my own expectations of the new president-elect.

.
